summary: MT5 Expert Advisor 'CHETAN HFT' for XAUUSD M1 with EMA-based buy entries, grid buy-stop orders, and basket trailing stop
architectural_notes: MQL5 Expert Advisor targeting XAUUSD symbol only
Buy-only strategy using 9-period EMA for trend detection
Entry: market buy when close crosses above EMA, no open positions
Grid expansion: 2 pending buy-stop orders after initial entry
Risk management: 300-pip SL, 100-pip TP, basket trailing stop at 100-pip total profit
Configurable inputs: EMA period, lot size, grid distances, trailing values

new_feature_requests.summary: EMA crossover entry logic: buy when close crosses above 9 EMA
Place 2 pending buy-stop orders after initial market entry
Initial SL 300 pips below entry, TP 100 pips for all positions
Basket trailing stop: trail by 50 pips when total profit exceeds 100 pips
Max 3 open positions, initial lot 0.01, adjustable inputs
